extended: S1: a season of the year (spring, summer, autumn, winter)
S2: a sports or competition season (for example the football season)
S3: a TV or theatre series season (for example season 2 of a show)
meaning.usageNotes: Common for the four seasons (stagioni). Also used for sports and TV or theatre seasons.

examples.it: S1: La mia stagione preferita √® l'autunno.
S1: In questa stagione piove spesso.
examples.en: In this season it often rains.

examples.it: S2: La stagione di calcio inizia a settembre.
examples.en: The football season starts in September.

examples.it: S2: Ha fatto una grande stagione quest'anno.
examples.en: He had a great season this year.

examples.it: S3: Ho guardato la seconda stagione della serie.
examples.en: I watched the second season of the series.

examples.it: S3: Questa stagione ha solo otto episodi.
examples.en: This season has only eight episodes.

grammar.notes: Feminine noun ending in -e. Plural changes to -i.

etymology.evolution: Sense shifted from fixed position or period to season or phase.
etymology.mnemonic: Think of a station as a fixed period in the year.
